abstract.para: This chapter explains the cataloging procedures carried out from the staff client.

section.title: Adding New Records via Built In Z39.50 Client
section.para: The Z39.50 client is used to search bibliographic databases and examine or download bibliographic records. Open the client with Cataloging Import Record from Z39.50

simplesect.title: Z39.50 Screen Features
simplesect.para: Initially, or when you want to change targets, start with the Service and Credentials area. Here you choose the remote databases you wish to search. Preconfigured servers are listed under Services. If any require authentication to access, you will see username and password boxes to the right.

procedure.step: Click all the databases you wish to search simultaneously (see the Note about which fields can be used).
Fill in user information for any that require it.
Click Save as Default to preserve these settings for next time.

simplesect.para: The Query section is where you enter a search. The databases you select control which search fields you can use. You may use any combination of fields that are active (not grayed out), but be aware that not all fields are active for every database. Select just one database to see which fields are active for that database.

note.para: If you are searching multiple databases, you will only get results from those that support the fields you're searching! For example, Keyword and Subject are only active if the local catalog is selected, so using those fields in a combined database search guarantees that you will only get results from the local catalog.

simplesect.para: The Query section has three buttons.

itemizedlist.listitem: Search begins searching on the criteria entered in the search fields.
Clear Form resets all fields to empty.
Raw Search is an advanced interface for using Prefix Query Format to build complex searches. See .

simplesect.para: The Results pane displays the results from the most recent search. Information about each record retrieved appears on a separate summary line, with various columns of information.

itemizedlist.listitem: If more than the default number of results is available, use Fetch More Results to add the next set to the screen.

Click List Action to view options for exporting and saving from the list:
Copy Field from selected row to Clipboard Print List CSV Copy List CSV to Clipboard Save List CSV to File Save List Configuration
Select an item and click MARC View to toggle viewing the MARC record. Results View
To view long lists of results, use Hide Top Pane to view the results.
